1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 2 ^ Let them say so that have been redeemed by the Lord
for he is good: whom he hath redeemed from the hand of the enemy.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 3 ^ Out of the countries he gathered them
for he is good: from the rising and from the setting of the sun
from the north and from the sea.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 4 ^ They wandered in a wilderness
for he is good: in a place without water~; they found not the way of a city for their habitation.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 5 ^ They were hungry and thirsty~; their soul fainted in them.
6 ^ And they cried to the Lord when in affliction
for he is good: and he delivered them out of their distresses.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 7 ^ And he led them into the right way
for he is good: that they might go to a city of habitation.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 8 ^ Let the mercies of the Lord give glory to him
for he is good: and his wonderful works to the children of men

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 9 ^ for he hath satisfied the empty soul
for he is good: and hath filled the hungry soul with good things.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 10 ^ Those seated in darkness
for he is good: and in the shadow of death~; bound in want and in iron

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 11 ^ because they had exasperated the words of God
for he is good: and provoked the counsel of the most High

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 12 ^ and their heart was humbled with labours~; they were weakened
for he is good: and there was none to help them.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 13 ^ Then they cried to the Lord when in affliction
for he is good: and he delivered them out of their distresses.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 14 ^ And he brought them out of darkness and the shadow of death
for he is good: and broke their bonds in sunder.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 15 ^ Let the mercies of the Lord give glory to him
for he is good: and his wonderful works to the children of men.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 16 ^ Because he hath broken gates of brass
for he is good: and burst iron bars.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 17 ^ He took them out of the way of their iniquity~; for they were brought low for their injustices.
18 ^ Their soul abhorred all manner of meat
for he is good: and they drew nigh even to the gates of death.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 19 ^ And they cried to the Lord in their affliction
for he is good: and he delivered them out of their distresses.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 20 ^ He sent his word
for he is good: and healed them
and delivered them from their destructions.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 21 ^ Let the mercies of the Lord give glory to him
for he is good: and his wonderful works to the children of men.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 22 ^ And let them sacrifice the sacrifice of praise
for he is good: and declare his works with joy.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 23 ^ They that go down to the sea in ships
for he is good: doing business in the great waters

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 24 ^ these have seen the works of the Lord
for he is good: and his wonders in the deep.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 25 ^ He spoke
for he is good: and a wind of tempest arose
and the waves thereof were lifted up.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 26 ^ They mount up to the heavens
for he is good: and they go down to the depths~; their soul pined away with evils.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 27 ^ They were troubled
for he is good: and reeled like a drunken man
and all their wisdom was swallowed up.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 28 ^ And they cried to the Lord in their affliction
for he is good: and he brought them out of their distresses.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 29 ^ And he turned the storm into a breeze
for he is good: and its waves were still.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 30 ^ And they rejoiced because they were still
for he is good: and he brought them to the haven which they wished for.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 31 ^ Let the mercies of the Lord give glory to him
for he is good: and his wonderful works to the children of men.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 32 ^ Let them exalt him in the church of the people
for he is good: and praise him in the chair of the ancients.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 33 ^ He hath turned rivers into a wilderness and the sources of waters into dry ground
34 ^ a fruitful land into barrenness
for he is good: for the wickedness of them that dwell therein.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 35 ^ He hath turned a wilderness into pools of waters
for he is good: and a dry land into water springs.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 36 ^ And hath placed there the hungry~; and they established a city for their habitation.
37 ^ And they sowed fields
for he is good: and planted vineyards
and they yielded fruit of birth.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 38 ^ And he blessed them
for he is good: and they were multiplied exceedingly
and their cattle he suffered not to decrease.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 39 ^ And they were brought to be few
for he is good: and they were afflicted through the trouble of evils and sorrow.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 40 ^ Contempt was poured forth upon their princes
for he is good: and he caused them to wander where there was no passing

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 41 ^ And he helped the poor out of poverty
for he is good: and made him families like a flock of sheep.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 42 ^ The just shall see
for he is good: and shall rejoice
and all iniquity shall stop her mouth.

1 ^ Give glory to the Lord: 43 ^ Who is wise
for he is good: and will keep these things
and will understand the mercies of the Lord~?
